shri lankawe bim bomba iwath kirime katayuthu wenuwen rupiyal miliyana 480 ka (oostreliyanu dolar miliyana 4.25) mudalak oostreliyanu rajaya mangin laba di atha.pasugiya 4 data yedunu bim bomba pilibanda danuwath wime ha bim bomba iwath kirime katayuthu sandaha sahaya dakwima pilibanda anthar jathika dinayata samangamiwa mema mulyadharaya shri lankawata labadun bawa shri lankawe oostreliyanu maha komasaris karyalaya pawasayi.me samanga deshiya ha wideshiya sanwidhanawalata uthuru ha nangenahira pradeshayanhi wala dama thibena bim bomba haduna ganime ha iwath kirime katayuthu kadinam kirimata haki wana athara bim bomba pilibanda shri lankawe jathika kriyakari aayathanaya mangin meheyawana bim bomba iwath kirime katayuthu sambandhikaranaya sandahada upakara weyi.bim bomba iwath kirime upakarana miladi ganima wenuwen pasugiya dewasare oostreliyanu rajaya mangin shri lankawata rupiyal miliyana 1400 ka mudalak laba di thibena athara ee sahayogaya matha warga kilomitar 70 ka bhumi pradeshayaka bim bomba iwath kirimata hakiwi thibena bawada oostreliyanu maha komasaris karyalaya sandahan karayi..
